description: Numbers n for which r^n-floor(r^n) > 1/2, where r is the real root of x^3-x-1.
comments: For large powers, r^n is very close to an integer.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pisot Number
mathematica: Flatten[ With[ {r = Root[ -1 - #1 + #1^3 &, 1 ]}, Position[ Table[ r^n - Floor[ r^n ], {n, 1, 200} ], _?(#1 > 1/2 & ), 1 ] ] ]
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
